raw: About the 30 Points for Downloading the App: Get 30 points when you download and log in to the DSW app as a DSW VIP member. Limit 1 download per VIP account. Valid on one device only. Points will display in 24-48 hours. One-time use. Not valid towards gift cards, past purchases, shipping, or tax. No cash back. Cannot be replaced if lost, stolen, or damaged. Exclusions apply. See store or dsw.com for details.
